author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-6231: smokeTestRelease.py should retry failed downloads

author: stefan2
msg: On the fsx-1.10 branch:  Simplify function signatures in dag_cache.c .
In a few cases, we don't need pools and svn_error_t return values.
(dag_node_cache_get): No pool needed and return the result directly.
svn_fs_x__invalidate_dag_cache): No pool nor error return needed.
svn_fs_x__set_dag_node): Sync header declarations with the definition.

author: brane
msg: On the pin-externals branch: Tweak the pin-externals API test to
exercise the case where an exernal reference has an operative revision.
(test_copy_pin_externals): Add operative revisions to two externals
references, one that gets pinned and one that doesn't.
